CustomField.description: IF( LEN( Phone) = 0, 0,20) + IF( LEN( Email) = 0, 0,20) + IF( LEN(MailingStreet) = 0, 0,20) + IF( LEN(Title) = 0, 0,20) + IF( ISPICKVAL(Salutation,""), 0,20)
CustomField.formula: IF( LEN( Phone) = 0, 0,1) + IF( LEN( Email) = 0, 0,1) + IF( LEN(FirstName) = 0, 0,0.5) + 1.5
CustomField.label: Data Quality Score
